title: Profile Configuration
description: Profile-specific configuration that determines which agents are compiled and how they are configured.

description.description: Human-readable description of the profile's purpose

claude_md.description: Relative path to the profile's CLAUDE.md file

agents.description: Map of agent IDs to their profile-specific configuration

AgentConfig.description: Profile-specific configuration for a single agent

core_prompts.description: Prompts that appear at the BEGINNING of the agent (before workflow)

ending_prompts.description: Prompts that appear at the END of the agent (after skills/examples)

precompiled.description: Skills compiled directly into the agent prompt (always available)

dynamic.description: Skills available for dynamic loading by the agent

PromptName.description: Name of a prompt file in core-prompts directory (without .md extension)

SkillReference.description: Reference to a skill with context-specific usage

usage.description: Context-specific description of when to use this skill
examples: when scoping features that involve authentication

path.description: Override the skill's path for this profile (optional)

name.description: Override the skill's display name for this profile (optional)

description.description: Override the skill's description for this profile (optional)

SkillId.description: Skill ID in hierarchical kebab-case format (category/name)
